title: Lars Reck
text:
Lars Reck (born 16 February 1999) is a Dutch <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="Sporting%20Hasselt">Sporting Hasselt</a>.
Club career.
He made his <a href="Eerste%20Divisie">Eerste Divisie</a> debut for <a href="MVV%20Maastricht">MVV Maastricht</a> on 9 November 2018 in a game against <a href="FC%20Volendam">FC Volendam</a>, as a 66th-minute substitute for <a href="Joeri%20Schroyen">Joeri Schroyen</a>.
Ahead of the 2019-20 season, Reck joined <a href="RKSV%20Minor">RKSV Minor</a>. On 4 January 2020, Reck moved to Belgium and joined <a href="Belgian%20Second%20Amateur%20Division">Second Amateur Division</a> club <a href="Sporting%20Hasselt">Sporting Hasselt</a>. In September 2020, he returned to the Netherlands and joined <a href="EHC%20Hoensbroek">EHC Hoensbroek</a>.
